meanings.sent1: The erosional forces shaped the landscape over time.
meanings.sent2: The erosional process slowly wore away the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The erosional rain made the ground all muddy and messy.
meanings.sent4: The erosional power of the river carved deep canyons through the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The erosional effects of wind and water can be seen in the smooth rocks near the shore.

meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the erosional patterns in the area.
meanings.sent2: The erosional changes in the landscape were evident.
meanings.sent3: The erosional history of the region fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The erosional impact of glaciers can be seen in the valleys.
meanings.sent5: The erosional features of the cliffs showed the power of nature.
